title: Safeway's O Organics typefaces
content:
Any help with this is much appreciated. I'm looking for both typefaces--the "O" and the "ORGANICS." Thank you!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [o\_organics.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20121128034504/http:/typophile.com/files/o_organics.jpg) | 12.25 KB |
author: allisondub

comments.content: ORGANICS looks like Gill Sans to me
The ‘O’ will be a tough one, but the rest is Gill Sans.
Much thanks on the Gill Sans ID. Any more thoughts on the 'O'?

Pick almost any serif or uneven sans that has some contrast. I think it would be nearly impossible to prove it was wrong.

- Mike Yanega
Thanks, Mike. That did the trick.
